item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

Sorry - didn’t have much time describing what was added. You probably think this is just another leech of something like 2006scape, let me you tell you something, you’re wrong!
It is an own base, using an own scripting language, over 21+ quests, 8+ minigames, there is so much!

World
Item dropping (global)
Pathfinding
Clipping (Player movement)
Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)


Client Features
- Loading full 377
- Auto cache downloader
- Full music system (fading music)
- Enter to login
- Ability to use k/m/b with money
- Quick reply option for private messages
- Multi platform support
- Fast client



Prayer
- All bones bury-able
- Every prayer working properly
- Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
- Zombie Random


Agility
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable
- Force movement mask
- Correct animations used
- Run energy affected by weight and level


Mining
- Empty and refilling rock's
- All ore can be mined
- Prospecting
- Random chance of obtaining gem's
- Rune essence
- Granite
- Sand-Stone


Smithing
- All bars smithable
- Smelting
- Correct animations, working interfaces & objects


Fishing
- All fish can be caught
- Big net fishing
- Correct item requirements
- Fishing spots located all around the world
- Correct animations


Cooking
- All fishes cookable
- All meat cookable
- Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
- Cooking gauntlets
- Correct anims & delays
- Working interface with multiple amount options
- Lumbridge cooking range bonus
- Eating food
- Wine


Woodcutting
- Stumps and re-growing trees
- Correct hatchet finding
- Correct hatchet animations
- All trees cut-able
- Correct fall chance algorithms
- Birds nest falling out
- Broken axe random event
- Spirit Tree
- Canoes (not all finished)


Firemaking
- Correct anims
- Ashes
- All logs lightable
- Colored fires
- Clipped
- Can't light fires in Bank
- Can click logs on the ground and light them


Fletching
- All logs can be fletched
- Correct interfaces
- Fletch 5, 10, x, all


Crafting
- Gem cutting
- Tanning
- Spinning & Picking flax
- Pottery
- Jewellery Moulding


Thieving
- Stall Thieving
- NPC Thieving
- Correct anims & gfx
- Correct Respawn Time


Runecrafting
- Altar Entering
- Tiaras
- All Altars
- Abyss


Herblore
- All potions makeable
- Identifying herbs
- Weapon poisoning





Combat
- PvP fully complete
- PvN fully complete
- X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
- Perfect max hit formulas
- Perfect accuracy formula
- Every weapon special attack
- Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades)
- Equipment requirements
- Weapon poisoning




Slayer
- Working slayer gems
- Working slayer shop
- Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop
- Generating task's bound on combat level/slayer level
- Remove task forever for slayer points
- Cancel task for slayer points
- All slayer masters
- All slayer masters can give you the slayer location
- XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task


Bosses
-TzTok-Jad
-Big Wolf 
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor 
-Dagannoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagannoth Prime
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon





Quests
-Cook's Assistant
-Doric's Quest
-Imp Catcher
-Pirates Treasure
-Restless Ghost
-Rune Mysteries
-Sheep Shearer
-Vampyre Slayer
-Witch's Potion
-Gertrudes Cat
-Lost City
-Druidic Ritual 
-Ernest The Chicken
-Priest in Peril 
-Romeo and Juliet
-Goblin Diplomacy
-Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)


Music & Sounds
-All skilling sounds (93% finished)
-All combat sounds (97% finished)
-Working music player and unlocking
-Music playing in all regions
-Music fade and volume control


Mini-games
-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars 
-Fight Caves
-Barrows Brothers
-Fight Pits
-Pest Control
-Fishing Trawler


Random Events
-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady
-Genie
-Rock Golem
-Spirit Tree
-Zombie
-Evil Chicken
- Swarm
- Shade
- Whirlpool
-Random Event Handling System
-No randoms in tut island, in certain areas, etc...


Miscellaneous
- Random event handler that works great with all random events eg; (halloween, christmas, easter)
- Skill handler that works great with all skills
- Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests
- Around 13 random events in place as of now
- 20 done to full completion (Farming is currently being done)
- Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)
- Pick-ables (cabbages, onions, wheat, bananas etc.)
- Skill interfaces
- Pets
- Working objects all around the world
- Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world
- Changelog with 650+ changes now
- Christmas Crackers
- Holiday events handler
- Working desert
- Single and double doors
- Dupe free guarantee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).
- Runescape guilds
- All consumables that runescape had in 2006
- Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only
- All runescapes shops that were in 2006
- All runescapes potions
- Correct runescape start
- Sailing
- Gnome Glider
- Bank Pins
- Correct runescape teleports
- Wilderness warning
- All rings/amulets loaded
- Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req
- Tele tabs
- Teleother
- Lots of minigames
- Clipping following/npcs
- Empty handler added for items that can be emptied
- Crystal Chest
- Flour Mill
- Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed
- Update Cache
- Members Only Benefits
- Runescape prices
- Chat filtering
- Running/w energy
- Magic Carpet
- Skill Guides
- Same or close to same exp rates as runescape will be voted for
- Weapon Poisoning
- Member only worlds
- Members get 352 bank slots while non members get 100
- Members get to attend any testing phase that is open before the server starts
- Members get a donator only forum section
- Members get to use simple BBcode such as Bold, Italics, and Underline.


Do not think this is all we have to offer, there is much much more, in which will come nearer the future.

3tvjDTf.png792×549

Read full topic
